  • Method Details

    • readInfo

      public void readInfo()
      A Constructor which accepts input values to build a student.
      Parameters:
      programName - The program of which the student is participating in
      studentNumber - The students unique ID
      firstName - The first name of the student
      lastName - The last name of the student
      emailId - The email of which the student desires to be contacted on
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the student

    • printInfo

      public void printInfo()
      Prints the info stored inside of the variables which are unique to each student

    • calculateGPA

      public void calculateGPA​(double[] deArray)
      Calculates the GPA of a student based on their course count and marks
      Specified by:
      calculateGPA in interface Policies
      Parameters:
      deArray - A Double array implemented from the policies interface. Length is based on the mark count entered for a student
      average - The average of the values entered
      sum - The sum of values
      gpa - The Grade Point Average of the student
